entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Completion doesn't show extension methods if there is a property with the same name #70537
  • LSP: Support `textDocument/semanticTokens/full` and `textDocument/semanticTokens/full/delta` #70536
  • A code fix for CS8767 (nullability doesn't match) and friends would be awesome #70535
  • CSharpImplementExplicitlyCodeRefactoringProvider threw and exception and crashed #70534
  • Roslyn tries to override inherited methods from a record in a class #70530

Closed

  • VS crahses on typing a new type constraint in complex generic code #57763
    17.9
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34224.107 #70544
  • Duplicate build errors are not collapsed in the error list #70044

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flakeyness in extract method test #70543
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge pull request #70347 into 17.8 #70542
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include syntax error in Hot Reload diagnostics reported to dotnet watch #70540
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of bugs found in "use collection expression" #70539
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support organizing imports as part of LSP document formatting #70538
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Attempt to work around GitHub Copilot breaking integration tests #70532
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add external access code action operation for renaming after code actions #70531
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update arrays in roslyn to use collection expressions #70528
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2300362 #70526
  • Cherry pick: Fix classification layering #70541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70533
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.9
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unnecessary casts. #70504
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70545
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reduce dependency on ImmutableDictionary in CompletionItem's properties storage. #70474
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix character offset off-by-one error in enhanced line directives #70247
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Update the approach we use to layer classifications #70522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip elements with false conditions during evaluation #70496
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Disable spell checker for integration tests #66000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EnC: Fix emit for anonymous indexed delegates #70501
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Modify BKTree.Lookup to pass the threshold to GetEditDistance when there will not be a need for the actual edit distance #70525
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Resolve reference paths to absolute paths #70527
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Apply NotNullIfNotNull postcondition on by-value parameters #70414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clean up inheritance hierarchy for CSharpAttributeData/VisualBasicAttributeData. #70519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
